info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 15 at 4:24PM CDT until May 15 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN SCOTT...NORTHEASTERN POLK...SOUTHWESTERN YELL AND WESTERN MONTGOMERY COUNTIES... At 424 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Oden, or 15 miles northwest of Mount Ida, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Oden... Mimosa... Pine Ridge... Cedar Creek... Pencil Bluff... Sims... Parks... Cherry Hill in Polk County... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
